title: Calories in Egg Beaters
meta_description: Discover calories in egg beaters per serving, including protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and nutrition tweaks for recipes.
assumptions: Egg Beaters Original liquid egg substitute, per 3 tbsp serving (46g), equivalent to 2 large eggs; no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by product variety, brand, and preparation method. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 3 tbsp serving of Egg Beaters provides 25 kcal and 5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to Egg Beaters with Yolk

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of egg beaters?
faqs.a: About 25 kcal per 3 tbsp serving of Egg Beaters Original.

faqs.q: Are egg beaters low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 0 g total fat per serving, making them a cholesterol-free alternative to whole eggs.

faqs.q: How much protein in egg beaters?
faqs.a: 5 g protein per 3 tbsp serving, similar to 2 egg whites.
No cholesterol (0 mg) in the original variety.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in egg beaters?
faqs.a: 170 mg sodium per 3 tbsp serving; opt for low-sodium versions if needed.
